review: really impressed with the Fire TV stick! I'm really glad I got this!

review: Love this product !! Can't say enough about this product!! We watch movies everyday!! Love it ! Better then Netflix and we have that too !!
author: paula reese

review: Thanks Amazon for making this great device I can watch all my Netflix movies and programs on my TV instead of on my computer this was a christmas present from my daughter and I love it so thanks again!

review: It more than exceeded my expectations!
author: Kathy Boswell

author: john hoffman

review: I recently got rid of satellite TV, planning to just watch Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime. Although it's possible it could be just my internet connection, it has to buffer every 1-2 minutes. I gave up after 10 minutes and now just watch on my MacBook Pro (which streams without any issues). Glad I recently bought a new 32-inch TV...
author: Sarah D.
